content: Dev ortamı için seed endpointi ekle: POST /api/dev/seed/agency-bookings ile demo booking, agency ve hotel verisi üret
Voucher parity: /api/bookings/{id}/voucher.pdf, /api/bookings/{id}/voucher/email, /api/bookings/{id}/self-billing.pdf backend + FinanceSummaryCard içinde voucher indirme/email UI
